about_the_game:
Pixel Art Coloring Book - Full Version grants you epic coloring activities for all ages. Have fun coloring by number over 3000 beautiful images in 15+ different categories! Pick your favorite ones and dive into pixel art magic right away!

AVAILABLE CATEGORIES:

🎨 Dogs Coloring Pages
🎨 Unicorn Coloring Pages
🎨 Cats Coloring Pages
🎨 Xmas Coloring Pages
🎨 Mandalas Coloring Pages
🎨 Fashion Coloring Pages
🎨 Seasons Coloring Pages
🎨 Flowers Coloring Pages
🎨 Emoji Coloring Pages
🎨 Pop Art Coloring Pages
🎨 Retro Coloring Pages
🎨 Love Coloring Pages
🎨 Character Coloring Pages
🎨 Anime Coloring Pages
🎨 Sports Coloring Pages

Enjoy the ultimate pixel art coloring experience with style. Now with even more coloring pages to choose from. Dive into the world of colors where nothing else matters.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.12+
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHZ
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics or GPU with at least 512 MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHZ
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics or GPU with at least 512 MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Pixel Art Coloring Book leads you even further into coloring adventure with the Full Version! Color by number with no limits and tons of choice! Paint over 3000 watermark-free images and create your own masterpieces in no time. Enjoy!
